An intern reused a prime when generating RSA keys. Can you recover the message they encrypted? Ciphertext: ciphertext1: 4124792615767483393749022100891838015033867270888524889608424846792393444520802996029256479009661762371734816738696456080253650978269881511752450744338787, ciphertext2: 2842398691434729756645846722193381556545864575254289423831922911262553390363214863420667451335545005078343654229665627182418917731108366541164220566689342

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=7954200102211696198721319729932231815699594330956320982640088645718393509179584678720252567688037632272760890120809894144913799267082254208988858921740159, n2=7082549228002115973730208518957851998907995808972240808527138170249632887097736546354703305148477704966664805068791277770733334069024205693886655226175569, e=5632170858492965065564119946722126124871489104974267334029788420852267999441366474910117186276944087314495357173638105150543619095918840688729543439296905

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{idsbb5gy}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 4124792615767483393749022100891838015033867270888524889608424846792393444520802996029256479009661762371734816738696456080253650978269881511752450744338787, ciphertext2: 2842398691434729756645846722193381556545864575254289423831922911262553390363214863420667451335545005078343654229665627182418917731108366541164220566689342
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=7954200102211696198721319729932231815699594330956320982640088645718393509179584678720252567688037632272760890120809894144913799267082254208988858921740159, n2=7082549228002115973730208518957851998907995808972240808527138170249632887097736546354703305148477704966664805068791277770733334069024205693886655226175569, e=5632170858492965065564119946722126124871489104974267334029788420852267999441366474910117186276944087314495357173638105150543619095918840688729543439296905
extra_info: p=85254299065384197383868005099039501988524964280791422575788315360271738318357, q=93299695023137431737885904501164186212516403283224491962359355334467320248387, r=75911815427110576579981782740119251294206151635218385742472026708711529485787, φ(n1)=7954200102211696198721319729932231815699594330956320982640088645718393509179406124726164046058915878363160686432608852777349783352544106538294119863173416, φ(n2)=7082549228002115973730208518957851998907995808972240808527138170249632887097567334844253057140159837279423521631284555215814891191319374311843476376441396
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
